CustomField.description: BODEV-76: Price Change of the Opportunity Product
CustomField.formula: IF( Discount_Percentage__c>0, "-" & TEXT(ROUND(Discount_Percentage__c*100, 3)) & "%", IF( Default_Price__c = 0, "0%", IF( Sales_Price__c > Default_Price__c, "+" & TEXT(ABS(ROUND(((Default_Price__c - Sales_Price__c) / Default_Price__c) * 100, 3)))&"%", "0%" ) ) )
CustomField.label: Price Change
